subject: Relief for Contractors - Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 Pandemic
text: HRam 74 TTHNf%ifeazrut (Tsw5 4de7 &r TTHrf TFI, MRT TRTFT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Rat4 T4t 6i-5 & 6, #4cr-10, ERAT, 78f fecft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TT/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Atmanirbhar Bharat /2023 Policy Circular No. 18.86/ 2023 dated 12th 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/COVID-19/RoadMap/ CMD/2020 (Comp. No. 5788)} Sub: Relief for Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic reg: MoRTH vide Letter No. COVID-19 /RoadMap/JS(H)/2020 (18377) dated 04.05.2023 on the subject mentioned above has provided some relief measures for a period of 01 year from 01.04.2023 to 31.03.2024 A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation_ 2  This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above 409/23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 . Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi: 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site_ 3. Web Admin for circulation. H1 T 7 NHAI May, Copy
